researchProjects.title: Gaze Conditioned Robotic Bimanual Manipulation Policy
researchProjects.desc: Adapting the Action Chunking Transformer (ACT) to a custom ALOHA setup and fusing gaze with VLM infrastructure for bimanual manipulation, reaching 90% success while reducing teleoperation effort.

researchProjects.title: Shared Autonomy for Teaching Parallel Parking in Driving Sim
researchProjects.desc: Developing shared autonomy with Zone of Proximal Development (ZPD) in CARLA and a two-phase NMPC expert for parallel parking, blending expert and user control to reach 96% success in simulation.

researchProjects.title: GAMMA: Gaze Based VLM Control for Single Arm Manipulation
researchProjects.desc: Gaze-assisted manipulation using foundation models (GAMMA), integrating wearable gaze streams with VLMs to infer intent and accelerate modular autonomy in robot manipulation.

researchProjects.title: Enhancing Pose Estimation on Swimmers
researchProjects.desc: Built swimmer action recognition with OpenPose and YOLOv7 plus data augmentation, improving accuracy and real-time performance by 30% and presenting results at IEEE SSIAI 2024.

researchProjects.title: Exercise Recognition with Pose Estimation on Edge Devices
researchProjects.desc: Designed and analyzed FPGA-based CNN pipelines for exercise recognition, benchmarking NVIDIA GPUs, Jetson Nano, and AMD Kria across 20+ models to compare performance and accuracy.
